javapns.data
Class PayLoad

java.lang.Object
  javapns.data.PayLoad

public class PayLoad
extends java.lang.Object

This class is the JSON representation of the notification See page 19 of Apple Push Notification Service Programming Guide NB : Future improvement : - add other features (body, action-loc-key, loc-key, loc-args...) - use a library to help create JSON Object http://www.json.org/java/

Author:
Maxime Peron

Constructor Detail

PayLoad

public PayLoad(java.lang.String alert,
               java.lang.String badge,
               java.lang.String sound)
Constructor

Parameters:
alert - The displayed message (can be null if no alert has to be displayed)
badge - The number (can be null if no badge has to be displayed)
sound - The played sound (can be null if no sound has to be played)
